sources.title: Cutting Class (1989) with Brad Pitt | Some People Would Kill To Fit In | 4K Horror Movie
sources.description:
A teenage girl befriends a suspected high school slasher.

Director: Rospo Pallenberg
Writer: Steve Slavkin

Main Cast:
Brad Pitt — Dwight Ingalls
Jill Schoelen — Paula Carson
Donovan Leitch — Brian Woods
Roddy McDowall — Mr. Dante
Martin Mull — William Carson III
Brenda James — Colleen
Robert Glaudini — Shultz
Dirk Blocker — Coach Harris
Nancy Fish — Mrs. Knocht

Genres: Horror, Black Comedy, Slasher, Mystery, Crime
Release Date: December 13, 1989 
Filming Location: Los Angeles


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: High school student Paula Carson's affections are being sought after by two of her classmates: Dwight, the "bad boy", and Brian, a disturbed young man who has just been released from a mental hospital where he was committed following the suspicious death of his father. Soon after being released, more murders start happening. Is Brian back to his old tricks, or is Dwight just trying to eliminate the competition?
metadata.Actors: Donovan Leitch Jr., Jill Schoelen, Brad Pitt
